name: Niko's & Pete's Bait & Switch Community Service at the Community Center!
name_original: Niko's & Pete's Bait & Switch Community Service at the Community Center!
description:
This game is a submission for #SaveOGL Game Jam.

Niko and Pete are in a bind! Due to Niko committing an entry-level tax fraud, both him and Pete have been assigned community service in a local community center. Luckily for them, the tasks aren't too numerous, and you can help them! Control both Niko and Pete as they make their way through their assigned tasks.

This game features:

- Gameplay familiar from the first two Paper Mario games! (AKA the good ones)
- Character graphics that look like they've been drawn on paper! (Which they have been)
- A battle system with timing-based attacks!
- Fishing and dissing as special moves!
- A hot mom!
- Fighting against the system!
- Corners where you can escape from to a black void! (This softlocks the game, so don't do that. But if you want to, you can press R to reset the situation!)

This game has been made by:
- Yuho (game concept and design, graphics, sound effects)
- Janne Mustaniemi (programming)
- Antti Kurki (music)
- Markku Luusua (sound effects)
